Игра веселая, но только на пару часов. Дальше вылезают все огрехи и играть становится невозможно. Лютый дисбаланс и читеры, куда же без них. С игрой можно ознакомиться, но играть на постоянку не рекомендую, будете гореть знатно. (читеры для вас есть специальный котел в дбд...)
Desde que introducieron al K-Poper ya no duermo por las noches

Давно хотел что-нибудь написать про эту игру, думаю, целостная картина мыслей прояснилась. 

Игра весёлая, с друзьями интереснее играть вдвойне и очень приятно проводить вечера, попутно разговаривая о каких-то незамысловатых темах. Но проблема этой игры является в каком-то невидимом для меня и многих игроков “магните токсичных людей”, к которым, даже, присоединишься и ты сам, если начнешь играть на любой из сторон. 

Допустим, я играю за мана, захожу просто ради того, чтобы погоняться за кем-нибудь на расслабоне и прокачать архив. Cтараюсь не туннелить, не стоять под крюками, не душу. Что же я за это получаю: оскорбления в чат, помои в профиль, привет маме, сообщения о том какой я ноускилл, причём за персонажа мог отыграть каток десять и должный опыт игры за конкретного убийцу ещё не сформировался. Да и вообще, почему я должен воспринимать эту игру ТАК СЕРЬЁЗНО, почему я ДОЛЖЕН ПОТЕТЬ, почему сурвы ждут от меня ПРОФЕССИОНАЛЬНОГО УРОВНЯ? Играя с мета-перками, они обвиняют в мета-перках манов, это полный идиoтизм! Ключи, фиолетовые аптечки, шестерёнки, но стоит им проиграть, то тебя обольют помоями, причём обосp*лись не они, а это ты подкемпил/подтуннелил. С новой ММР системной, лично для меня, игра за манов стала более напряженной и я испытываю большой стресс, играя за относительно средних убийц.

Аналогично можно и сказать о манах, которые просто не дают тебе банально поиграть в игру, постоянно прибегают под конец второй фазы на крюке, гонятся за тобой если ты ранен, но я не могу сказать, что я испытываю ТОТ ЖЕ СТРЕСС ЧТО И ЗА МАНА! У меня есть и осколок, и орех, и стояк деда, я могу взять аптечку и быстро полечиться шприцом. Дать за мана -4 гораздо сложнее, чем сбежать за выжившего. 

Подводя итог хочу сказать, что основные проблемы игры это баланс, который, на самом деле, очень трудно сделать равным для обеих сторон, а также неадекватное комьюнити, постоянно ноющее и криворукое, не пытающееся искать ошибки в себе, а просто написать бред в чат.

27.10.21

Это больше не весело, теперь сурвы лечатся от тотемов, что в нормальных ситуациях потребовало бы им найти сначала друг друга и полечиться, либо использовать аптечку. Тотемные перки прямым образом влияют на игру и только ускоряют её, ведь лечение является частью таймера игры, который влияет на общий прогресс. Играть против SWF стало невозможно, из-за инфы о тотеме в другой части карты, который может находиться рядом с геном. Представьте, сколько времени вам нужно потратить, чтобы дойти с одной части карты на другую и уничтожить тотем, просто ради того, чтобы предотвратить хилл.

DBD, was kann man dazu sagen...Es ist an sich ein großartiges Spiel vor allem wenn man mit mehreren Leuten zusammen spielt, aber es hat auch ein riesen Frust Potenzial. Es gibt leider so viele Leute die einem den Spaß am Spiel nehmen wollen und dies auch meist schaffen. Sei es jetzt der Killer der dich ab campt oder tunnelt, oder der eigene Team-Mate der dich blockt und dem Killer hilft. Trotz allem ist es schön wenn man es schafft das alle entkommen und als Team arbeiten oder wenn der Killer merkt dass du schlecht bist und dir helfen will besser zu werden. Ansich ist es Geschmackssache ob es einem gefällt oder nicht, aber mit meinen 1000 Std kann ich sagen dass es einen Versuch wert ist.

Dead by Daylight is simple to pick up and casual, yet highly inconsistent in the fun factor. The game has 2 core issues: development issues and the community itself. These issues make it impossible for me to recommend it to anyone new, unless you are mentally prepared to ignore following issues, and instead just have fun with the game.

I’ll admit there is one huge positive that draws attention to this game – the sheer amount of horror-related media and amazing work done by the creative team when bringing new content and iconic licensed media to the game. It is currently a one-of-a-kind asymmetrical game with so much content and it’s amazing to have something like dbd.
Let’s take issues one at a time.

[h1] Development and game priorities/issues [/h1]
Just like any multiplayer game, developers need some time to gather performance data and online feedback from players in order to make more balance changes. That’s totally fine and understandable. 6.1.0 update gave a lot of changes to perks on both sides, which was a much needed change for the game that had stale meta perks on both sides. Survivors aimed for a cheap press of a button-perk (which either made boosted survivors look even more boosted, made bad survivors reach higher ranks where they don’t belong, or made good loopers extend chases for a much longer time), anti-tunneling and anti-camping perks (aggressively focusing on getting one specific player out of the game asap; latter – killer getting their first down and not leaving the hooked player, just waiting until they hang there long enough to get out of the match). Killers often ran 3-4 gen-slowdown perks, which are extremely oppressive against non-coordinated survivor teams, and it’s especially painful when you solo-q. Killers resorting to camping and tunneling is unfun for the suffering survivors and has been an issue in the game since release.

But when you join this game’s official forums, you’ll notice that dev priorities lie elsewhere. Instead of addressing the uptick in camping and tunneling after 6.1.0 update on every MMR level by making either basekit counters better or add another in-game counter, devs are nerfing niche survivor perks, anti-tunneling perks to the ground. Over time you’ll notice questionable changes (or lack of needed ones) that no one asked for anywhere online. It makes you question if devs actually read forums or they simply stick to their own vision of the game. Despite this, over time this game got more new passionate people working on it (judging from new content releases and dev streams) and even with questionable changes in mind, it seems they are really trying to make the game fair and fun for both sides and that effort is appreciated. Although like I said, sadly the success rate and impact of these changes on the game varies and for longtime players, waiting for needed changes for what seems like forever – that indeed can be frustrating.

Another frustrating thing is the MMR system. Your MMR rating changes based on only 2 conditions – # of survivors escaping, # of sacrifices and kills for both sides respectfully. This system is extremely barebones and flawed. As survivor you can do most healing for the team, gen progression, altruistic assist actions, or as killer you can get 2 hooks on all survivors and max out in other killer-action categories – all this ultimately means nothing, as bush-hiding, non-altruistic teammates and getting more hook numbers by tunneling and camping have more of an impact than any amount of work you’ve done prior.

This game’s spaghetti code seems to break after every update, delivering more mind-blowing bugs, some bugs giving unfair advantages (most of them happen on killers), frustrating lag on last-gen consoles, which take devs months to fix or years of what seems like nothing but promises. At best, you'll get a petty amount of compensation currency, which don't help the still remaining grind for unlocking all perks on both sides. Sound bugs appear when there’s no possible way they could even happen after downloading an update, which simply implements new chapter content to the game. The game still has no cross-progression between consoles, and with the date of the last mention of this topic by the devs, you should never pick this game up on anything but PC if you want your progress and purchased content to be saved.

[h1]The community[/h1]
You’ve most likely seen this common statement about dbd – the majority of the playerbase are extremely entitled and just like in any multiplayer game, you’ll meet toxic people.
Of course that’s not entirely true. I’ve met some of the sweetest and even sympathetic, supportive strangers in dbd. It’s amazing that not just mutual interest in horror media, but retaining basic good manners with a stranger online can make your day so much better and fun.

But unfortunately, this is indeed a smaller portion of the community. The game does have some competitive elements to it, but with its asymmetrical base nature and devs struggling to find a good middle ground for the consistency of the fun factor for both sides – you will inevitably come across entitled, toxic people.

A lot of players suffer from lack of empathy and sportsmanship. If a survivor loses, at least one of them will take their time to sit until the killer sees the endgame chat and insult you, file a false in-game report and/or accuse the killer of anything they didn’t like, oftentimes for something they haven’t done in the match. If you get an uneventful and/or unfun match as killer, whether it be survivors rushing the game to end, skilled survivors or bully squads – you are very likely to be met with the infamous sight of survivors teabagging you at the exit gates. That ‘them vs us’ mentality is the main factor why this game is unfun – most people don’t care there are real people behind the screen and WANT to deliberately ruin a random stranger’s day. Some even going as far as perma-bodyblocking teammates, working with the killer, killers with one-shot downs specifically camping anyone they get for “content” or their own sadistic amusement. I can’t express how horrible some of the comments I got were, especially ‘why should I care about other people’s fun?’. It’s gotten so heartbreaking and even intoxicating that at times I get frustrated and act in same manner myself, now I simply keep all PC chat features turned off almost all the time. For every 1 wholesome player, there’s 10 more people whose goal is to make you feel miserable. 

Devs don’t take action on unsportsmanlike in-game behaviour/comments, unless you record video evidence of said acts (you are basically encouraged to record yourself playing dbd all the time, if you want these people to get a warning suspension or a deserved, eventual permanent ban from the game), report the issue on the endgame screen, then report it on their Support website. It’s nice to know they care about keeping the game a fun, less toxic space, but I feel this behaviour needs to be discouraged as early as possible by either perma-banning people with enough reports, and/or encouraging individual endorsements for good play, fun, help factor and etc.
---
Dead by Daylight is a simple, unique game, but its fun factor greatly suffers from hit-or-miss management from developers, company higher-ups very likely dictating future priorities that devs have no control over, awful “community” finding ways of rubbing in toxic behaviour and making you feel miserable for opening dbd in the first place. Until the 2 core issues are addressed, I can’t recommend dbd to any new player and anyone who wouldn’t like to involve themselves in any of the above mentioned mess.
5/10

This is one of the best if not the best multiplayer non FPS game I've played. There's always new content being released, the challenges and game format are interesting and ergonomic. The ranking system is fairly unique and keeps me engaged with ranking up. There are so many different survivors and killers, and perk combos. Each game is really a surprise, and it's almost never a one man mission, you have to help and expect help from your team. This game has me absolutely HOOKED.

怎么说呢，游戏还是比较乱，特别是匹配机制，这是很多玩家不满的一点，人类基本排到的是萌新屠夫，而萌新屠夫很少会匹配到跟自己实力差不多的，而且角色越做越差，新出的钉子头真是骂声一片，刚上线那会还有人玩，现在都没人玩了，但值得夸赞的一点是官方最近做的传承还可以，钉子头的厄咒玩物不错的，之前追追的角色成功但传承一个算是电涌的改版，歇斯底里用处不是很大，开局报位置适合护士，该做点原创角色了可以听听玩家的意见老是联动的话原创性还是有点低，联动角色传承除了巴布以外都不咋好尤其是鬼面，而原创角色技能谈不上好但不印度，希望接下来的角色会有原创
